```tsx cacheapi/frontend/app/routes/job.tsx
import { Box, Title, Text, Space } from "@mantine/core";

export async function loader({ params }) {
  const data = await fetch("http://localhost:8080/job?uuid=" + params.jobId);
  return data.json();
}

export default function Job({ params, loaderData }) {
  return (
    <Box m={20}>
      <Title order={2}>Job Details</Title>
      <Space h="md" />
      <Text>Job ID: {params.jobId}</Text>
      <Text>{loaderData.url}</Text>
      <Text>{loaderData.ttl}</Text>
    </Box>
  );
}
```
